CustomField.description: FOB - If any of the lines in LiG contain a FOB Point value of "Shipping Point", "Free Delivery Point", or "Other" then "FOBRequestedIndicator" and "FOBAcceptedIndicator" should be set to "Y"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: FOB - If any of the lines in LiG contain a FOB Point value of "Shipping Point", "Free Delivery Point", or "Other" then "FOBRequestedIndicator" and "FOBAcceptedIndicator" should be set to "Y"
CustomField.label: FOBRequestedIndicator
